mapper.select: select a.chatnum, a.chatroom, a.chatuser, a.chatcontent, a.chatdate,b.user_num, b.nickname,b.user_img from chat a, user_info b, chatroom c where (b.user_num = a.chatuser and a.chatroom = c.chatroom and (a.chatuser=c.user1 or a.chatuser=c.user2)) and a.chatroom= #{roomNum} order by 1 asc

select a.user_num, b.user_num, b.nickname, b.user_img,
r.chatroom, r.user1, r.user2 from user_info a, chatroom r , user_info b where a.user_num = #{user_num} and (a.user_num = r.user1 or a.user_num=r.user2) and (b.user_num = r.user1 or b.user_num=r.user2) and a.user_num !=b.user_num

select chatnum, chatroom, chatuser, chatcontent, chatdate,
user_num, nickname, user_img from (select * from chat order by rownum desc) , user_info where chatcontent = #{chatcontent} and chatroom = #{chatroom} and chatuser = #{chatuser} and rownum = 1

select chatnum, chatroom, chatuser, chatcontent, chatdate,
user_num, nickname, user_img from (select * from chat order by 1 desc) , user_info where chatroom = #{chatroom} and rownum = 1

select user_num, user_img, nickname from user_info where user_num in (select distinct n.notifyusernum from notify n, chatroom c where n.notifyusernum=c.user1 and n.notifyuser=#{usernum} and c.user2=0)
mapper.update: update chatroom SET user2 = #{user2} where user1 = #{user1}
